resources.string:
"Gcina lezinto engqondweni:
"
"I-Face Unlock ivikeleke kancane kunephethini, i-PIN, noma iphasiwedi.
"
Omunye ocishe afane nawe angayivula ithebhulethi yakho."
"
Idatha esetshenziswe ukukhomba ubuso bakho igcinwa ngasese kuthebhulethi."
"

" "
"Thola indawo esendliniâ€”engakhanyi kakhulu noma engemnyama kakhulu.
"
Bamba ucingo luqondane nehlo."
"

"Ukuze uvule ithebulethi yakho, vele uyibuke.
Ithiphu: Yenza kangcono ukufana kobuso ngokuthatha ubuso bakho izithombe ngezimo ezahlukahlukene."

"Izibonelo:
"
"Ezibanini ezahlukene
"
Ngezibuko noma ngaphandle kwazibuko ezichasisiwe"
"
Kunentshebe noma kushefiwe"
"" Bamba ithebhulethi iqondane nehlo."
